import React , {Component} from 'react' import './design.css' import {NavLink} from 'react-router-dom' export default class SignUp extends Component{ constructor(){ super() this.state={ name:'', email:'', pwd:'', repwd:'', loading:false, message:'' } } postData(e){ e.preventDefault() let name = this.state.name let email = this.state.email let pwd = this.state.pwd let repwd = this.state.repwd } render(){ return(

Registration form

Please fill all field to create an account.






Already have an account? Sign in.

) } }
